text: @GrandpaSnarky @NikkiHaley - Very nice comments about Trump. You really need to explain his lack of leadership and response to the Covid19 pandemic to the 130000 dead Americans and the 40000000 unemployed. The 1% enjoyed the tax cut and the rest of America will pay for the deficit for years.
